block.p: American League NEW YORK YANKEES--Activated RHP Orlando Hernandez from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Randy Choate to Columbus of the International League. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Recalled RHP Cory Lidle from Durham of the International League. Optioned RHP Travis Harper to Durham.

American League NEW YORK YANKEES--Activated RHP Orlando Hernandez from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Randy Choate to Columbus of the International League. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Recalled RHP Cory Lidle from Durham of the International League. Optioned RHP Travis Harper to Durham.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Placed Kerry Wood on the 15-day disabled list. Activated OF Rondell White from the 15-day disabled list. COLORADO ROCKIES--Activated LHP Scott Karl from the 15-day disabled list. Placed RHP Giovanni Carrara on the 15-day DL retroactive to August 3. HOUSTON ASTROS--Activated RHP Jay Powell from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Scott Linebrink to New Orleans of the PCL. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Traded 2B Mickey Morandini to Toronto for a player to be named. Designated RHP Peter Munro for assignment. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Traded OF Bruce Aven to Los Angeles for a player to be named.
National Football League GREEN BAY PACKERS--Waived WR-KR Joey Jamison.
